    • Uses of MaintenanceOptions in io.vertx.ext.consul

      Methods in io.vertx.ext.consul that return MaintenanceOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MaintenanceOptions MaintenanceOptions.setEnable(boolean enable)
      Set maintenance mode to enabled: true to enter maintenance mode or false to resume normal operation.
      MaintenanceOptions MaintenanceOptions.setId(String id)
      Set the ID of service.
      MaintenanceOptions MaintenanceOptions.setReason(String reason)
      Set the reason message.
